document_data.name: Shraevyn
document_data.mainbody: '''Shraevyn''' was a [[magelord (title)|magelord]], and [[magic]]al weaponsmith from the [[Dalelands]] in 10th century [[DR]]. He left a legacy on the art of weapon crafting and magic as a whole as both author and practitioner. He left many of his secrets in [[Shraevyn's Tomb|crypt]] in which he was interred, as well as his ''magnum opus'' the famous [[Sword of the Dales]].`

Personality.Faith: Shraevyn was a follower of the faith of [[Tymora]] and felt her to be most helpful during his adventuring days.
Personality.Relationships: Throughout his life, Shraevyn had a number of apprentices. His most trusted was a wizard named [[Karten]], to whom Shraevyn left nearly all his treasure before he died. Since the weapon-mage died, Karten traveled to city of [[Sigil]], located in the center of the [[multiverse]].

document_data.Works:
Shraevyn possessed a vast knowledge about magical crafting and [[enchantment]], having written several books on the subject.
*''[[The Art of Weaponcrafting]]''
*''[[Metal Spellweaving]]''
*''[[Shraevyn's Guide to Magical Mastery]]''
